content.query:
-- CREATE LOGIN data_explorer WITH PASSWORD = 'My Very Strong Password 1234!';

--CREATE USER data_explorer FOR LOGIN data_explorer;
--GO
--GRANT ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO data_explorer;
--GO

-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE JmLake
-- WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://jmsynapsedl.dfs.core.windows.net')

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/jmsynapsefs/',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'JmLake',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
